messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Penis'
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All: It was so refreshing to read that others had made the same decision about the no-circ.  The site no.circ was mentioned in one of the articles I read in
messages.messageBody:
Hi All:

It was so refreshing to read that others had made the same decision about the
no-circ. The site no.circ was mentioned in one of the articles I read in
England in 1994 when I was pregnant with Zak. I'm happy to hear there is
another one that's giving out information to parents so they can make more
informed decisions.

Dawn

are people who get up and look for the
circumstances they want, and,
if they can't find them, make them." - George Bernard Shaw

"The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in school."-George
Bernard Shaw
